thread.title: Man in hospital after 'targeted' shooting in Stepps
thread.title_full: Man in hospital after 'targeted' shooting in Stepps

title: Man in hospital after 'targeted' shooting in Stepps
text:
Man in hospital after 'targeted' shooting in Stepps 13 March 2017 These are external links and will open in a new window Close share panel Image copyright Google A 42-year-old man is being treated in hospital after being shot in a targeted attack near Glasgow. 
Police were called to Honeywell Drive, in Stepps, just after 21:00 on Sunday. 
The man is said to be in a stable condition in hospital. Related Topics
